Article.Title: Advocates: NC DEQ water permitting limited by proposed bill ...
Preview: Legislators are seeking to change a North Carolina law that is central to an ongoing lawsuit over biogas digesters on hog farms.
Key.Author: Adam Wagner

Article.Title: Complaint faults NC for failing to regulate poultry farms | Charlotte ...
Preview: The NC Department of Environmental Quality’s approach disproportionately hurts people of color, the complaint says.
Key.Author: Adam Wagner

Article.Title: Durham County to have environmental justice in health report ...
Preview: Alamance County was the first to include an environmental justice chapter in its community health assessment. Several more are coming.
Key.Author: Adam Wagner

Article.Title: NC lawmakers considering reducing wetlands protections | Raleigh ...
Preview: NC legislators are considering changing the state’s wetlands definition to match the federal government’s, which the Supreme Court sharply limited.
Key.Author: Adam Wagner

Article.Title: Could NC regulators reduce unequal pollution exposures? | Raleigh ...
Preview: Some environmental lawyers believe that state environmental regulators have more authority than they use to weigh pollution already released in a community before allowing more.
Key.Author: Adam Wagner

Article.Title: Mapping NC environmental permits reveals uneven risks | Raleigh ...
Preview: NC environmental activists focuses on cumulative impacts in rural areas. But some people in urban corridors live near multiple sources of pollution emissions too.
Key.Author: Adam Wagner

Article.Title: NC regulatory bill helps RDU quicken new runway construction ...
Preview: A sprawling regulatory reform bill includes two provisions that tweak environmental rules to help RDU’s proposed runway construction.
Key.Author: Adam Wagner

Article.Title: NC's Mandy Cohen may be Biden's next CDC leader, Post says ...
Preview: Dr. Mandy Cohen has been in the private sector for the past year and a half.
Key.Author: Adam Wagner

Article.Title: AI presents 'risk of extinction,' Duke professors caution | Raleigh ...
Preview: The new statement equates artificial intelligence potential harms to those of nuclear weapons and pandemic. Could a bot fire nuclear weapons?
Key.Author: Adam Wagner

Article.Title: NCDOT opens new lanes on Interstate 40 south of Raleigh | Raleigh ...
Preview: New lanes opened in each direction, but there’s still more work to do.
Key.Author: Adam Wagner
